name: peroxide
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a liquid chemical used to make hair very pale in colour or to kill bacteria: Peroxide is a bleach and an antiseptic. Peroxides are found in household detergents. She has dyed her brown hair peroxide blonde. See also
hydrogen peroxide specialized
